thread.title: Man found shot to death inside car in California neighborhood identified
thread.title_full: Man found shot to death inside car in California neighborhood identified

author: Matthew Keck
title: Man found shot to death inside car in California neighborhood identified
text: Coroners identify 47-year-old found shot to death inside car in California neighborhood Coroners identify 47-year-old found shot to death inside car in California neighborhood TOMORROW. REPORTING IN THE STUDIO, MADELINE CARTER, WLKY NEWS. LATE BREAKING NEWS RIGHT NOW. POLICE ARE INVESTIGATING A DEADLY SHOOTING IN THE CALIFORNIA NEIGHBORHOOD. IT HAPPENED ABOUT A HALF HOUR AGO IN THE 1500 BLOCK OF PRENTISS STREET. IT’S NEAR THE COMMUNITY CENTER IN THE PARK THERE. METRO SAFE CONFIRMS THERE WAS ONE VICTIM WHO DIED. WE HAVE A CREW HEADED TO THE SCENE, AND WE WILL, OF COURSE, UPDATE Y Advertisement Coroners identify 47-year-old found shot to death inside car in California neighborhood The Jefferson County Coroner's Office has identified the man who was found shot to death inside a car earlier this week.Louisville Metro Police Department responded to the 1500 block of Prentice Street on Tuesday around 5:23 p.m. about a person down in a vehicle.When officers arrived, they found 47-year-old Roderick McKisick suffering from a gunshot wound inside a car. Officers attempted to render life-saving aid, but he was pronounced dead on the scene.LMPD's Homicide Unit is handling the investigation. No arrests have been made at this time.Anyone with information regarding the case is asked to call LMPD's anonymous tip line at 502-574-LMPD (5673) or use the LMPD Crime Tip Portal. LOUISVILLE, Ky. — Anyone with information regarding the case is asked to call LMPD's anonymous tip line at 502-574-LMPD (5673) or use the The Jefferson County Coroner's Office has identified the man who was found shot to death inside a car earlier this week. Louisville Metro Police Department responded to the 1500 block of Prentice Street on Tuesday around 5:23 p.m. about a person down in a vehicle. Advertisement When officers arrived, they found 47-year-old Roderick McKisick suffering from a gunshot wound inside a car. Officers attempted to render life-saving aid, but he was pronounced dead on the scene. LMPD's Homicide Unit is handling the investigation. No arrests have been made at this time. Anyone with information regarding the case is asked to call LMPD's anonymous tip line at 502-574-LMPD (5673) or use the [LMPD Crime Tip Portal](https://urldefense.com/v3/__https:/www.p3tips.com/TipForm.aspx?ID=563&C=&T=__;!!Ivohdkk!mW8HotqvizN6kDzZUkg5wjmWrPAP9kIlAC3aCCxD4wRjQWg-hgOvkIi2zZmau1iruxA2quV99cDCbs6_OCe7m3DD1N0e$).
